languages.text: "В таком случае, я готова вынести приговор. Простолюдинка Ризза, ты обвиняешься в пиратстве, пособничестве мятежникам, а также в богохульной ереси и почитании Губительных сил. Принимая во внимание твое покаяние, я дарую тебе быструю смерть. Что касается твоей команды, то они предстанут перед судом в свое время, наравне с остальными на станции".

"In that case, I am ready to hand down your sentence. Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Given your repentance, I will grant you a quick death. As regards your crew, they will face trial in due time, on the same terms as others on this station."
languages.original_text: "В таком случае, я готова вынести приговор. Простолюдинка Ризза, ты обвиняешься в пиратстве, пособничестве мятежникам, а также в богохульной ереси и почитании Губительных сил. Принимая во внимание твое покаяние, я дарую тебе быструю смерть. Что касается твоей команды, то они предстанут перед судом в свое время, наравне с остальными на станции".

traits.locale_text: "In that case I am ready to pass my sentence. Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. In view of your repentance, I will grant you a quick death. As regards your crew, they will face trial in due time, on the same terms as others at this station."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "In that case, I am ready to hand down your sentence. Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Given your repentance, I will grant you a quick death. As regards your crew, they will face trial in due time, on the same terms as others on this station."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “既然如此，我准备对你进行宣判。平民莱萨，本法院指控你犯下了海盗罪、协助叛乱罪、教唆叛军罪、异端亵渎罪，以及崇拜毁灭之力罪。鉴于你的忏悔，我会给你个痛快。至于你的船员，他们会在合适的时候接受审判，审判条件与这座星站的其他人相同。”
languages.original_text: "In that case, I am ready to hand down your sentence. Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Given your repentance, I will grant you a quick death. As regards your crew, they will face trial in due time, on the same terms as others on this station."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，我准备对你进行宣判。既然如此，我准备宣判了。平民莱萨，本法院指控你犯下了海盗罪、协助叛乱罪、教唆叛军罪、异端亵渎罪，以及崇拜毁灭之力罪。鉴于你的忏悔，我会给你个痛快。至于你的船员，他们会在合适的时候接受审判，审判条款与这座星站的其他人相同。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「それならば、判決を下してやろう。平民リザよ。お前は海賊行為、反逆者幇助、冒涜的な異端、禍つ神々崇拝の罪に問われている。悔い改めれば、速やかな死を認めよう。お前の仲間は、やがて裁判を受けることになる。ステーションにいる他の物達とと同じ条件でな」
languages.original_text: "In that case, I am ready to hand down your sentence. Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Given your repentance, I will grant you a quick death. As regards your crew, they will face trial in due time, on the same terms as others on this station."

traits.locale_text: 「それならば、判決を下してやろう。平民リザよ。お前は海賊行為、反逆者幇助、冒涜的な異端、禍つ神々崇拝の罪に問われている。悔い改めれば、速やかな死を認めよう。お前の仲間は、やがて裁判を受けることになる。ステーションにいる他の物達とと同じ条件でな」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «En ese caso dictaré sentencia. Ryzza, se le acusa de piratería, de ayudar e instigar a rebeldes y de herejía y adoración a los Poderes Ruinosos. Dado su arrepentimiento, le concederé una muerte rápida. En cuanto a su tripulación, serán juzgados a su debido tiempo, en las mismas condiciones que el resto de esta estación».
languages.original_text: "In that case, I am ready to hand down your sentence. Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Given your repentance, I will grant you a quick death. As regards your crew, they will face trial in due time, on the same terms as others on this station."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso dictaré sentencia. Ryzza, se le acusa de piratería, de ayudar e instigar a rebeldes y de herejía y adoración a los Poderes Ruinosos. Dado su arrepentimiento, le concederé una muerte rápida. En cuanto a su tripulación, serán juzgados a su debido tiempo, en las mismas condiciones que el resto de esta estación».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Dann bin ich bereit, die Strafe zu verhängen. Ryzza, Ihr werdet der Piraterie angeklagt, der Beihilfe zur Rebellion und der blasphemischen Ketzerei und Anbetung der Mächte der Zerstörung. Angesichts Eurer Reue gewähre ich Euch einen schnellen Tod. Was Eure Crew angeht, ihr wird zu gegebener Zeit der Prozess gemacht, zu denselben Bedingungen wie anderen auf dieser Station."
languages.original_text: "In that case, I am ready to hand down your sentence. Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Given your repentance, I will grant you a quick death. As regards your crew, they will face trial in due time, on the same terms as others on this station."

traits.locale_text: "Dann bin ich bereit, die Strafe zu verhängen. Ryzza, Ihr werdet der Piraterie angeklagt, der Beihilfe zur Rebellion und der blasphemischen Ketzerei und Anbetung der Mächte der Zerstörung. Angesichts Eurer Reue gewähre ich Euch einen schnellen Tod. Was Eure Crew angeht, ihr wird zu gegebener Zeit der Prozess gemacht, zu denselben Bedingungen wie anderen auf dieser Station."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, je suis prête à prononcer la sentence. Roturière Ryzza, vous êtes accusée de piraterie, de soutien aux rebelles, d'hérésie et de vénération des Puissances de la Ruine. Du fait de votre repentir, je vous accorde une mort rapide. Quant aux membres de votre équipage, ils seront jugés en temps utile, au même titre que tous les autres résidents de cette station. »
languages.original_text: "In that case, I am ready to hand down your sentence. Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Given your repentance, I will grant you a quick death. As regards your crew, they will face trial in due time, on the same terms as others on this station."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, je suis prête à annoncer la sentence. Roturière Ryzza, vous êtes accusée de piraterie, de soutien aux rebelles, d'hérésie et de vénération des Puissances de la Ruine. Du fait de votre repentir, je vous accorde une mort rapide. Quant aux membres de votre équipage, ils seront jugés en temps utile, au même titre que tous les autres résidents de cette station. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Bu durumda cezanı vermeye hazırım. Avam kesimden Ryzza; korsanlıkla, isyancılara yardım ve yataklık etmekle, din dışı kâfirlikle ve Yıkıcı Güçler'e tapınmakla suçlanıyorsun. Tövbe edişini göz önünde bulundurarak sana çabuk bir ölüm bahşediyorum. Mürettebatına gelince... Onların yargılanması ilerleyen dönemde, bu istasyondaki diğer herkesle aynı şartlar altında yapılacak."
languages.original_text: "In that case, I am ready to hand down your sentence. Commoner Ryzza, you are charged with piracy, with aiding and abetting rebels, and with blasphemous heresy and worship of the Ruinous Powers. Given your repentance, I will grant you a quick death. As regards your crew, they will face trial in due time, on the same terms as others on this station."

traits.locale_text: "Bu durumda cezanı vermeye hazırım. Avam kesimden Ryzza, korsanlıktan, isyancılara yardım ve yataklık etmekten ve din dışı kâfirlikten ve Yıkıcı Güçlere tapınmaktan suçlanıyorsun. Tövbe edişini göz önünde bulundurarak sana çabuk bir ölüm bahşediyorum. Mürettebatına gelince, onların yargılanması ilerleyen dönemde, bu istasyondaki diğer herkesle aynı şartlar altında yapılacak."
traits.speaker: Chorda
